level.heading: ORDER OF BUSINESS FOR ADDITIONAL AND SPECIAL MEETINGS (ยง 7-1515)

level.text: The Board shall be called to order at the time and place set forth in the notice for the meeting.
The Chairman shall ascertain the presence of a quorum before any business is transacted.
The Board shall take up business in the order set forth in the agenda for the additional or special meeting. A quorum shall be present, before any business can be transacted.
